logentry.author: simon
logentry.msg:
merge: ISSUE_13572_b_SpdC61WithoutPlaning, 207245-207430, to 10.118.12D, 10.118.15 by 書豪
from start
fix: 修正主軸轉動中進行主軸定位時，若減速時間超過5秒會劇烈減速的問題

logentry.author: mstsai0113
logentry.msg:
merge: CNCKL_2475_f_MitsubishiAlarm_v2, 206344-207476 to 10.118.15 merge: CNCKL_2475_f_MitsubishiAlarm_118_12x_v2, 206076-207477 to 10.118.12D by 儀禕
feature 1. 支援三菱(Mitsubishi)EtherCAT串列參數讀寫。 2. 支援三菱(Mitsubishi)EtherCAT驅動器警報顯示。

logentry.author: mstsai0113
logentry.msg: feature 提高追隨誤差檢查的時序

logentry.author: mstsai0113
logentry.msg:
merge: CNCKL_2585_f_FixFollowingErr, 206745 to 10.118.12D, 10.118.15 by 建明
feature 提高追隨誤差檢查的時序

logentry.author: mstsai0113
logentry.msg:
merge: CNCKL_2569_f_eHMCSupportTCode, 206925-207550 to 10.118.15 merge: CNCKL_2569_f_eHMCSupportTCode_11812x, 207554-207555 to 10.118.12D by 孟學
feature 1.eHMC & FC 可支援T碼 2.新增Function 30，支援G10L1050/G10L1051，eHMC & FC & Cutting系列( 60CA除外 )不支援，其他機型都預設支援 3.新增機型HC-8E, HC-10E, HC-15E

logentry.author: mstsai0113
logentry.msg:
merge: ISSUE_13761_b_safenewSPDfail, 207060-207474 to 10.118.12D, 10.118.15 by 竺晏
from 10.118.12, CNCKL-2337 修正變頻主軸與軸向為相同Port號造成系統當機的問題

merge: ROBOT_237_f_ApplicationSwitchParam_118_14, 207122-207616, to 10.118.12D, 10.118.15 by 柏維
feature
機器人產品( ARTIC, SCARA, DELTA ) 1. 新增參數Pr4001【*工藝包組態設定】。 2. 新增R值 R9501~R9532【工藝包組態】。
